divs: Sighting Details5 Objects were observed taking off approximately 2.5 to 3.5 Kilometers away. Video recording of the objects were taken by two cell phones. 2 videos are 2-3 minutes long. The objects did not all follow the same flight path. Accurate distance could not be determined due to unknown size. I am a military contract and Army veteran and have deployed 5 times to the middle east, when I saw the lights they appeared odd and that is what caught my interest. Only emotions were curiousity. Visual contact was lost when the objects dimmed.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Clayton
There were no other sightings in Clayton on or around November 16th 2012
Summary: 5 objects were observed taking off and were recorded for approx 3 min
